LABEL: 0xB6BD
STRING: Reiri had infected her with it.

LABEL: 0xB6EB
STRING: Touri had tried to stop Reiri, even if it meant hurting her.

LABEL: 0xB71F
STRING: These three survivors――

LABEL: 0xB73B
STRING: I had to get them out of here.

LABEL: 0xB771
STRING: But how?

LABEL: 0xB793
STRING: There were only a limited number of methods available.

LABEL: 0xB7B5
STRING: ――Send someone out on the rescue ship to call for help.

LABEL: 0xB7EB
STRING: There was no other course of action that could be taken.

LABEL: 0xB819
STRING: But... who?

LABEL: 0xB837
STRING: ――I had to choose.

LABEL: 0xB8FD
STRING: 「Choose...?」

LABEL: 0xB919
STRING: I couldn't help but say it out loud.

LABEL: 0xB941
STRING: I had no choice but to choose.

LABEL: 0xB963
STRING: Choose someone to board the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0xB991
STRING: ...Yukari was out of the question, being infected with <COOS>.

LABEL: 0xB9C5
STRING: If word got out that the <SHEEP III> was contaminated with <COOS>, no help would ever come.

LABEL: 0xBA22
STRING: She couldn't call for help in the first place.

LABEL: 0xBA5C
STRING: There was no telling what would happen on this ship if I left.

LABEL: 0xBAA6
STRING: If I left Yukari's side, there would be no one left to care for her.

LABEL: 0xBAEE
STRING: So... what about Touri and Reiri?

LABEL: 0xBB12
STRING: Although she was unconscious now, the possibility that she'd attack Reiri when she woke up again couldn't be ruled out.

LABEL: 0xBB7E
STRING: By the same logic, it was also out of the question to put those two inside the same ship.

LABEL: 0xBBCC
STRING: If so, the choice was between two of them――

LABEL: 0xBBFC
STRING: 「Only one of them...」

LABEL: 0xBC18
STRING: I said it out loud again.

LABEL: 0xBC3E
STRING: 「We can only send one person to the surface...」

LABEL: 0xBC6C
STRING: We would entrust everything to a single person, send them up on the rescue ship, and wait for rescue.

LABEL: 0xBCA6
STRING: ...It would be fine.

LABEL: 0xBCC2
STRING: There was no telling how much time had passed since the steam room had been destroyed.

LABEL: 0xBD06
STRING: It was already chilly inside the ship, but I was sure it would only grow colder.

LABEL: 0xBD4E
STRING: But... This was still bearable.

LABEL: 0xBD80
STRING: If we could send even one person back to the surface rather than continue this stalemate...

LABEL: 0xBDD0
STRING: It would have to be as soon as possible.

LABEL: 0xBDF4
STRING: Touri and Reiri――

LABEL: 0xBE10
STRING: If we were only able to send one of the two out of here...

LABEL: 0xBE4C
STRING: ...Which one would it be?

LABEL: 0xBE80
STRING: Which of them was more suitable?

LABEL: 0xBEAA
STRING: Whose hand was the right one to take?

LABEL: 0xBF0C
STRING: ...I couldn't decide.

LABEL: 0xC0B7
STRING: I couldn't choose anymore.

LABEL: 0xC0D5
STRING: I didn't want a maze. I wanted a straight road.

LABEL: 0xC10F
STRING: Just pressing a single lever in front of me was enough.

LABEL: 0xC157
STRING: I didn't want a choice.

LABEL: 0xC183
STRING: Freedom and choice... I couldn't do it anymore.

LABEL: 0xC1B7
STRING: The pain of my past choices still haunted me.

LABEL: 0xC1FD
STRING: Was it really okay for me to choose Reiri?

LABEL: 0xC235
STRING: If I had chosen Tokiwa, she would still be alive.

LABEL: 0xC263
STRING: Yukari wouldn't have had to kill her.

LABEL: 0xC30C
STRING: And I was sure――

LABEL: 0xC32C
STRING: I was sure there would be a happier ending――

LABEL: 0xC35A
STRING: That thought weighed heavily on me like sin itself.

LABEL: 0xC396
STRING: That was the same as saying that I should have left Reiri to die, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0xC3E6
STRING: As Touri said, there was no substitute for one's life.

LABEL: 0xC424
STRING: Killing someone in exchange for letting someone else live shouldn't exist.

LABEL: 0xC470
STRING: That way of thinking.

LABEL: 0xC48C
STRING: That kind of regret.

LABEL: 0xC4A8
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0xC4C0
STRING: That was exactly why I couldn't make a choice.

LABEL: 0xC4F4
STRING: I could see only one of the branching possibilities with my eyes.

LABEL: 0xC536
STRING: In this world where half of the options were closed off to us...

LABEL: 0xC568
STRING: ...I was not able to trust myself anymore.

LABEL: 0xC662
STRING: I knew that I was the worst.

LABEL: 0xC690
STRING: I knew, but I couldn't stop it.

LABEL: 0xC6DB
STRING: I took out the pendant that was in my pocket.

LABEL: 0xC717
STRING: On the front was a portrait of a queen, and on the back was an engraving of a cross.

LABEL: 0xC757
STRING: A long time ago, my sister――

LABEL: 0xC78D
STRING: That was all over now.

LABEL: 0xC7AB
STRING: Memories that never came true pierced my heart.

LABEL: 0xC7DF
STRING: I removed the coin from the chain, placed it on my palm...

LABEL: 0xC81F
STRING: ...And threw it in the air――

LABEL: 0xC837
STRING: I couldn't choose for myself.

LABEL: 0xC857
STRING: To escape that responsibility, I resorted to a fate I did not believe in.

LABEL: 0xC8A3
STRING: I opened the palm of my hand.

LABEL: 0xC8C9
STRING: The coin showed――

LABEL: 0xC8E3
STRING: ――Heads.

LABEL: 0xC8F9
STRING: That was the choice I was not able to make.

LABEL: 0xC927
STRING: The fate which I couldn't choose.

LABEL: 0xC94F
STRING: I had no choice but to accept this fate.

LABEL: 0xC983
STRING: I'm sorry... Touri.

LABEL: 0xC9C3
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0xC9EC
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0xCA0B
STRING: While I was lost in thought,

LABEL: 0xCA31
STRING: Reiri was unconcerned about me and was preparing to draw blood from Yukari's arm.

LABEL: 0xCA81
STRING: She had her back turned to me as she stood there, making clinking noises.

LABEL: 0xCACB
STRING: 「――Put your hands in the air.」

LABEL: 0xCB19
STRING: 「Put your hands in the air!」

LABEL: 0xCB37
STRING: I shouted.

LABEL: 0xCB4D
STRING: Reiri, who ignored me the first time, stopped her hands.

LABEL: 0xCB92
STRING: 「What right do you have to interfere?」

LABEL: 0xCBD6
STRING: 「You must really hate me, don't you?」

LABEL: 0xCC50
STRING: 「Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0xCC6D
STRING: Reiri looked back at me suspiciously.

LABEL: 0xCCFF
STRING: 「You bastard――」

LABEL: 0xCD1E
STRING: She looked at me.

LABEL: 0xCD40
STRING: Our eyes met. She then lowered her gaze and looked back up at me.

LABEL: 0xCD7A
STRING: The girl glared at me in annoyance.

LABEL: 0xCDA2
STRING: I could see it in her eyes.

LABEL: 0xCDC8
STRING: The speargun was loaded with a new arrow.

LABEL: 0xCE07
STRING: 「What are you trying to do?」

LABEL: 0xCE28
STRING: 「Walk over here...」

LABEL: 0xCE67
STRING: 「...Stop bluffing. We don't have time for this.」

LABEL: 0xD046
STRING: I didn't hesitate anymore.

LABEL: 0xD068
STRING: The arrow I fired in a threatening manner grazed Reiri's hair and pierced the wall behind her.

LABEL: 0xD0B6
STRING: 「Am I bluffing?」

LABEL: 0xD0D8
STRING: 「I got these arrows from Hiragino-san earlier.」

LABEL: 0xD10C
STRING: 「This speargun is still perfectly functional.」

LABEL: 0xD13A
STRING: 「It'll kill you.」

LABEL: 0xD1DC
STRING: 「You can't aim properly, can you?」

LABEL: 0xD21E
STRING: 「Are you trying to shoot me blindly with those eyes of yours?」

LABEL: 0xD254
STRING: 「You might end up killing the attendant or my sister.」

LABEL: 0xD28D
STRING: 「Sure... But...」

LABEL: 0xD2AD
STRING: Reiri was putting on a front.

LABEL: 0xD2CB
STRING: But, she couldn't hide her trembling voice.

LABEL: 0xD313
STRING: I put the muzzle of my gun on her thin chest.

LABEL: 0xD347
STRING: There was a light sensation.

LABEL: 0xD35F
STRING: It was a body of a living girl.

LABEL: 0xD37F
STRING: 「...If I'm close like this, I can't miss.」

LABEL: 0xD3E9
STRING: 「Shut up.」

LABEL: 0xD405
STRING: 「You're right... We don't have much time.」

LABEL: 0xD4A1
STRING: With the muzzle of my gun pointed at her, I dragged Reiri along.

LABEL: 0xD593
STRING: At that moment――

LABEL: 0xD5AD
STRING: She, whose life I had saved by taking her hand...

LABEL: 0xD5E1
STRING: I was now driving her to the brink of death.

LABEL: 0xD60F
STRING: I couldn't help but smile at my own selfishness.

LABEL: 0xD6BE
STRING: What right did I have to tamper with her life?

LABEL: 0xD704
STRING: After threatening Reiri, I headed straight for the ramp of the submarine.

LABEL: 0xD84D
STRING: 「What are you planning?」

LABEL: 0xD870
STRING: 「You know how to operate it, right?」

LABEL: 0xD896
STRING: 「Go to the surface and tell them.」

LABEL: 0xD8C0
STRING: 「Call for help.」

LABEL: 0xD8EA
STRING: That was no longer a threat.

LABEL: 0xD916
STRING: If anything, it was closer to a plea.

LABEL: 0xD9AE
STRING: 「There's still something I need to do――」

LABEL: 0xD9E3
STRING: 「Stop.」

LABEL: 0xDA03
STRING: Reiri turned around and stopped dead in her tracks.

LABEL: 0xDA33
STRING: She stared at me.

LABEL: 0xDAE8
STRING: She stood still, not saying a word.

LABEL: 0xDB14
STRING: As if assessing something.

LABEL: 0xDB56
STRING: Should I entrust the <Onyx> to her?

LABEL: 0xDB96
STRING: It was a black box that had recorded everything that had happened on the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xDBD1
STRING: That information would let them know that we were still alive here.

LABEL: 0xDC2F
STRING: It would let them know the full tragedy that had taken place here――

LABEL: 0xDC5B
STRING: However.

LABEL: 0xDC71
STRING: Everything that Touri had done was also recorded there.

LABEL: 0xDCAD
STRING: And the fact that Yukari was infected with <COOS>...

LABEL: 0xDCDB
STRING: So...

LABEL: 0xDCF3
STRING: I couldn't give her the <Onyx>.

LABEL: 0xDD99
STRING: 「Reiri... You're the only one I can count on.」

LABEL: 0xDDC3
STRING: 「Preserve our hopes.」

LABEL: 0xDDE7
STRING: Reiri was staring at my face.

LABEL: 0xDE13
STRING: I stared back at her.

LABEL: 0xDE39
STRING: She was the only thing I could see.

LABEL: 0xDE6B
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0xDEE0
STRING: She smiled.

LABEL: 0xDEFE
STRING: As if she had figured it all out.

LABEL: 0xDF66
STRING: With that, Reiri disappeared up the ramp and into the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0xDFAA
STRING: The thick hatch closed behind her.

LABEL: 0xDFCE
STRING: I pressed the water pump button of the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0xE000
STRING: On the other side of the door, water began pouring in.

LABEL: 0xE02A
STRING: Now, there was no turning back.

LABEL: 0xE056
STRING: The only thing Reiri could do was take the rescue ship to the surface.

LABEL: 0xE094
STRING: There was no freedom there.

LABEL: 0xE0B8
STRING: I had locked her, who sought freedom, inside a small cage.

LABEL: 0xE0F8
STRING: Toyed with her as I pleased...

LABEL: 0xE124
STRING: However, that was fine.

LABEL: 0xE14A
STRING: That was fine――

LABEL: 0xE168
STRING: Reiri would survive.

LABEL: 0xE188
STRING: And when she reached the surface, she would call for help.

LABEL: 0xE1C6
STRING: I had to be patient until then...

LABEL: 0xE289
STRING: Again, on the other side of the thick wall, there was the sound of something sinking into the sea.

LABEL: 0xE2CD
STRING: ――At least, that was what it felt like.

LABEL: 0xE2F1
STRING: The vast and dark sea...

LABEL: 0xE30F
STRING: The world spreading outside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xE33A
STRING: The surface Reiri had talked about, or even the bottom of the sea...

LABEL: 0xE374
STRING: No matter what was happening outside this confined cage, it didn't matter anymore.

LABEL: 0xE426
STRING: 「There's only two left...」

LABEL: 0xE448
STRING: Reiri would be saved.

LABEL: 0xE46C
STRING: Only Yukari and Touri remained.

LABEL: 0xE48C
STRING: For the sake of the dead Hiragino and Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0xE4BE
STRING: ...We would survive.

LABEL: 0xE4E6
STRING: 「I have to save them.」

LABEL: 0xE5C1
STRING: I started walking as I spoke and tripped over something.

LABEL: 0xE5F7
STRING: It was the speargun I had let go of at some point.

LABEL: 0xE62D
STRING: I crouched down and picked up the gun lying at my feet once more.

LABEL: 0xE667
STRING: ――When Touri woke up again, it would be the same as with Reiri.

LABEL: 0xE6A9
STRING: I'd make her wait patiently.

LABEL: 0xE6CD
STRING: Let's be safe and not do anything dangerous.

LABEL: 0xE6FD
STRING: I had to protect her――

LABEL: 0xE729
STRING: I'd stay next to her until the very end.

LABEL: 0xE9C9
STRING: Yukari was still sleeping on the bed.

LABEL: 0xE9FB
STRING: There was no problem there... She couldn't move.

LABEL: 0xEA29
STRING: She wouldn't do anything dangerous.

LABEL: 0xEA59
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0xEB11
STRING: 「Touri?」

LABEL: 0xEB29
STRING: ――Touri was gone.

LABEL: 0xEB55
STRING: Strange.

LABEL: 0xEB6D
STRING: She was passed out on the floor a moment ago.

LABEL: 0xEBA9
STRING: When did she wake up...?

LABEL: 0xEBCD
STRING: ...And where did she go?

LABEL: 0xEBF9
STRING: I remembered something at that moment.

LABEL: 0xEC17
STRING: The fact that she was still inside the <SHEEP III> was thanks to a flip of a coin.

LABEL: 0xEC60
STRING: It was not that I didn't take her hand.

LABEL: 0xEC90
STRING: ――The choice I made this time wouldn't lead to loss of life.

LABEL: 0xECD4
STRING: They would both survive.

LABEL: 0xECF8
STRING: 「I'll... definitely bring her back to the surface.」

LABEL: 0xED30
STRING: To that end――

LABEL: 0xED63
STRING: I gripped the speargun in my right hand even tighter.

LABEL: 0xEDA3
STRING: ――I had to find Touri.

LABEL: 0xEE3B
STRING: Determined, I took a step into the dark hallway.
